column1: "EN": "OECD Creditor Reporting System (CRS) code list for Finance Types"
@0@NON FLOW ITEMS@Non resource flow items requested on DAC table 1
@100@GRANT@Transfers in cash or in kind for which no legal debt is incurred by the recipient.
@200@INTEREST SUBSIDY@Subsidies to soften the terms of private export credits
column2: or loans or credits by the banking sector.

column1: @300@CAPITAL SUBSCRIPTION@Payments to multilateral agencies in the form of notes and similar instruments
column2: unconditionally cashable at sight by the recipient institutions.

column1: @400@LOAN@Transfers in cash or in kind for which the recipient incurs legal debt.
400@412@Loan in a joint venture with the recipient@

@450@EXPORT CREDIT@Official or private loans which are primarily export-facilitating in purpose.  They are usually tied to a specific export from the extending country and not represented by a negotiable instrument.
450@452@Non-banks non-guaranteed portions of guaranteed export credits@
@500@EQUITY@Investment in a country on the DAC List of ODA Recipients that is not made to acquire a lasting interest in an enterprise.
500@510@Acquisition of equity as part of a joint venture with the recipient@
500@511@Acquisition of equity not part of joint venture in developing countries@

column3: debt rescheduling within or outside the framework of the Paris Club.

column1: 600@630@Debt rescheduling: OOF claim (DSR - original loan principal)@
600@631@Debt rescheduling: OOF claim (DSR - original loan interest)@
600@632@Debt rescheduling: Private claim (DSR - original loan principal)@
@700@INVESTMENT@Investment made by a private entity resident in a reporting country to acquire or add to a lasting interest(1) in an enterprise in a country on the DAC List of ODA Recipients.
@800@BONDS@Acquisition of bonds issued by developing countries.
900@912@Securities and other instruments issued by multilateral agencies@
